title: Reset all sales and order records for a fresh start

requirements.text: Clear all existing finalized order and sales records from the backend so the app starts with zero historical data. The menu items must remain intact. After the reset, all sales report views (daily summary, item-wise, date-wise) should show empty/zero states.

quotes: give me fresh without any record so that i can display it

acceptanceCriteria: All previously saved orders are removed from backend storage.
The daily summary card shows ₹0 revenue and 0 items sold.
The item-wise sales table is empty.
The date-wise sales table is empty.
All menu items (10 categories, ~72 items) remain fully intact and visible on the Menu Management and Order Taking screens.
New orders can be placed and saved successfully after the reset.

constraints: Do not delete or modify any menu items — only order/sales records should be cleared.
Do not reset or alter the backend menu seeding logic.
nonGoals: Changing any UI layout or visual theme.
Modifying order-taking or billing calculation logic.
